banksim 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Simulate the queuing system of a bank

Multiserver.Rd

This function takes information about customer arrival and service times and simulates the queuing system of a bank.

Multiserver(Arrivals, ServiceTimes, NumServers = 1)

Arguments

Arrivals

a vector of customer arrival times in ascending order
ServiceTimes

a vector of corresponding customer service times
NumServers

an integer of the number of service servers of a bank

Value

a data.frame simulating the queuing system of the bank:

Arrivals

arrival time of a customer, in seconds

ServiceBegins

the time that the customer service begins

ChosenServer

the server that the customer goes through

ServiceEnds

the time that the customer service ends

Examples

Multiserver(bank$arrival_time, bank$service_time, 3)
